The field officers effectiveness lies in their intensive visits in their jurisdiction and supervision of work. In the modern days of communication; the requirement of their coming to Headquarters should be minimal, as it affects the progress of work. 2 In the light of the above, in partial modification of earlier Administration/ Finance Policy Circular No.57/2009 dated 7.9.2009 , it has been decided to modify Clause No.15 (Part-| Establishment) as under: (A) Sl To whom Proposed delegation No. delegated 15.
